Package sage.input.action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IAction
    This interface specifies the methods which must be implemented by all concrete subclasses of AbstractInputAction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractInputAction
    AbstractInputAction is the base class from which all SAGE input actions are derived.
    LookDownAction
    An IAction which rotates a camera in the negative direction about its local "U" (X) axis (that is, it applies a "pitch" action to the camera in the downward direction).
    LookLeftAction
    An IAction which rotates a camera in the positive direction about its V (Y) axis.
    LookRightAction
    An IAction which rotates a camera in the negative direction about its V (Y) axis.
    LookUpAction
    An IAction which rotates a camera in the positive direction about its local "U" (X) axis (that is, it applies a "pitch" action to the camera in the upward direction).
    MouseLookAction
    MouseLookAction allows an application to perform "mouselook" operations using the mouse X and Y axes to control a camera.
    MoveBackwardAction
    An IAction which moves the camera backwards -- that is, in the opposite of the direction in which the camera is pointing as defined by the camera's viewdirection vector.
    MoveDownAction
    An IAction which moves the camera down -- that is, in the direction opposite to that in which the camera's up (V) vector is pointing.
    MoveForwardAction
    An IAction which moves the camera forward -- that is, in the direction in which the camera is pointing as defined by the camera's viewdirection vector.
    MoveLeftAction
    An IAction which moves the camera left -- that is, in the opposite direction of the camera's U (X) direction vector.
    MoveRightAction
    An IAction which moves the camera right -- that is, in the direction of the camera's U (X) direction vector.
    MoveUpAction
    An IAction which moves the camera up -- that is, in the direction in which the camera's up (V) vector is pointing.
    QuitGameAction
    QuitGameAction is an AbstractInputAction which sets the "game over" flag in a game true.
    ResetCameraAction
    An IAction which resets a camera to a default position.
    RollLeftAction
    An IAction which rotates a camera in the negative direction about its view direction axis (that is, it applies a "roll" action to the camera in the leftward direction).
    RollRightAction
    An IAction which rotates a camera in the positive direction about its view direction axis (that is, it applies a "roll" action to the camera in the rightward direction).
    RunAction
    RunAction is a modifier action that tracks state associated with other IActions.
